code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input  logic [15:0] in,    // 16-bit input vector
    output logic [7:0] out_hi, // Upper byte output
    output logic [7:0] out_lo   // Lower byte output
);

always @(*) begin
    out_hi = in[15:8]; // Assign the upper 8 bits to out_hi
    out_lo = in[7:0];  // Assign the lower 8 bits to out_lo
end

endmodule
```
[DONE]

iterations.code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input  logic [15:0] in,    // 16-bit input vector
    output logic [7:0] out_hi, // Upper byte output
    output logic [7:0] out_lo  // Lower byte output
);

assign out_hi = in[15:8]; // Assign the upper 8 bits to out_hi
assign out_lo = in[7:0];  // Assign the lower 8 bits to out_lo

endmodule
```
issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
